known_issues: QR Code PIX not displaying in checkout

existing_features.title: Debug and fix the PIX QR code display issue in the checkout flow. The QR code should be visible when users select PIX as the payment method.

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify the PixQrCodeDisplay component is properly integrated in CheckoutPage and receives correct payment data from the PagBank payment flow.
Ensure the PIX payload generation in pixPayload.ts creates valid BR Code format with correct CRC16 checksum for QR code scanning.

projectName: Fix PIX QR code not displaying in checkout
